name: Action Battle Game
description:
this game is inspired by a web game I played a lot. The battle runs by itself, but the player can use skills (using hotkeys 1, 2, 3, 4) and change target (mouse click). Keep killing enemies to loot better items and level up if stuck, or change skills to try new strategies.

Instructions:

  • click enemy to change target
  • press 1, 2, 3, 4 hotkeys to use assigned skills
  • you can sell items in the shop by right-clicking them

Current features:

  • character creation (classes are currently purely cosmetic)
  • 9 skills
  • 1 map, 9 levels
  • save and load (1 slot only)
  • randomly generated shop

Future features:

  • online
  • each class will have its own skill tree
  • 9 maps, each with 9 levels
